verses.verse: <S%H3588>Because<s%> He has <S%H5186>inclined<s%> His <S%H241>ear<s%> to me, Therefore I shall <S%H7121>call<s%> [upon Him] as <S%H3117>long<s%> as I <S%H3117>live.<s%>

The <S%H9112>cords<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H661>encompassed<s%> me, And the <S%H4712>terrors<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> <S%H4672>came<s%> upon me; I <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H6869>distress<s%> and <S%H3015>sorrow.<s%>
Then I <S%H7121>called<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord:<s%> "O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I <S%H577>beseech<s%> Thee, <S%H4422>save<s%> my <S%H5315>life!<s%>"
<S%H2587>Gracious<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> Yes, our <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H7355>compassionate.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8104>preserves<s%> the <S%H6612>simple;<s%> I was <S%H1809>brought<s%> <S%H1809>low,<s%> and He <S%H3467>saved<s%> me.
<S%H7725>Return<s%> to your <S%H4494>rest,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1580>dealt<s%> <S%H1580>bountifully<s%> with you.
For Thou hast <S%H2502>rescued<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H4194>death,<s%> My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from <S%H1832>tears,<s%> My <S%H7272>feet<s%> from <S%H1762>stumbling.<s%>
I shall <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> In the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>
<S%H4100>What<s%> shall I <S%H7725>render<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> For <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H8408>benefits<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> me?
I shall <S%H5375>lift<s%> up the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> And <S%H7121>call<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
I shall <S%H9608>pay<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H4994>Oh<s%> [may it be] in the <S%H5048>presence<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H5971>people.<s%>
<S%H3368>Precious<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> Is the <S%H4194>death<s%> of His <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H2623>ones.<s%>

<S%H577>O<s%> <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3588>surely<s%> I am Thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> I am Thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of Thy <S%H519>handmaid,<s%> Thou hast <S%H6605>loosed<s%> my <S%H4147>bonds.<s%>
To Thee I shall <S%H2076>offer<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> And <S%H7121>call<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
I shall <S%H9608>pay<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H4994>Oh<s%> [may it be] in the <S%H5048>presence<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H5971>people,<s%>
In the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H3050>Lord<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> In the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of you, O <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> the Lord!
